Text: Could You Please seed the whoe thing ? instead of piecewise seeding ?
I prefer to do each disk one at a time as it gives time to get them seeded properly as there are a lot of leechers out there.

Actually I meant that you Seed the whole disc at once instead of every file one by one, thats just crappy slow. It makes me "loose my will to live." (Sg.Atl. Zelenka) 
Have to leech with 5 kb/s whilst seeding with 300kb/s .. That annoys so much that I don't wanna load at all.
